description: ID of an Assessment.
ID of a learner's attempt of an assessment.
ID of a section's instance of an assessment.
ID of a learners response to an assessment item.
Code indicating the status of the assessment item.  Values: scored, offline_scored: manually scored, assigned: not yet started, responded: being scored
The nth time a certain learner attempted the assessement.
The date and time the assignment is due.
The date and time the assignment was submitted for scoring.
True if the assignment was submitted late.
The number of times a learner can attempt the assessment.
The date and time a section is scheduled to start the assignment.
Type of assessment values: rubric, assessment, practice, clo, game.
Numeric final score of the assessment.
True if the assessment item affects the learner's grade.
True if the record is deleted.

True if the assessment attempt was forced to be scored because the learner did not submit the assignment before the final possible submission datetime and the policy dictates forced scoring for that format.
True if the assessment attempt requires a manual score. Changes to false after manual scoring is entered.
True if the assessment item was scored manually. Example: Essay questions.
Code indicating the type of assessment item.  Example: shortAnswer, matching, etc.
ID of and assessment item assigned to a learner.
ID of one of possibly several attempts by a learner to pass the assessment.
The status of a learner's attempt of the assessment.  Example: assigned, awaiting outcome, fully scored, in progress.
ID of a learner.
The latest date and time a learner must finish the assessment.
The earliest date and time a learner can start the assessment.
Number of questions on assessment.
The number of learner's assigned this instance of an assessement. The number of learners in a section.
ID of a organization containing multiple sections.
Numeric highest possible score of the assessment.
Code indicating the correctness of the assessment item.  Example: incorrect, correct, partially_correct, etc.
The date and time the assessment attempt was scored.
Code indicating the type of scoring for the assessment item.  Values: external and  automatic: scored by computer; manual and unassiged: manually by a human
ID of a section containing multiple students.
The date and time the learner began the attempt of this assessment.
The date and time the learner finished the attempt of this assessment.
The date and time the assessment was scored.
The date and time the assessment attempt was in progress.
The date and time the assessment was submitted for scoring.
